Streets Of Rage - A Los Angeles reporter, who is a former Special Forces commando, investigates a human trafficking ring.

1993
Stars: Mimi Lesseos, Oliver Page, Christopher Cass

metadata.Plot: Melody Sails (Mimi Lesseos) is an investigative reporter on Hollywood's juvenile delenquincy, and runs across Lunar, the crimelord. With the help of a 12-year old street-kid, she will get to him, but will she down him in the climactic fight to the death, or die trying?
metadata.Actors: Mimi Lesseos, Oliver Page, Christopher Cass
